title: game giving me 20 min que
body:

replies.body: ok I was in that match I dont think u deserve it and we won that match plus we dominated when u were afk
o that's y well thx for telling me
but I wasn't even afk for that long
and also we were winning and when I left It didn't make my team do any worse

Hey lexyir,

The Leaver Buster system is automated. If you are gone too long too often, you will have to work through the low priority queue like everyone else. If you don't deserve it then you won't get any more because you don't leave any games. Otherwise, you're going to get more penalties next time. If you have recurring issues then you need to get them fixed before you queue up. Riot will not remove the penalties regardless of your reason, because it is ruining the match for other players no matter why it happened.

For more information on Leaver Buster, read here; https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ

-DTN
